ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Photographs showing (A) presentation and (B) resolution of an infantile hemangioma in patient 4 (upper left and right photos), and (C) presentation and (D) resolution of an infantile hemangioma in patient 5 (bottom left and right photos).

Captions.MediaCaption: Patient 4 at (A) presentation and (B) resolution. Patient 5 at (C) presentation and (D) resolution. Ma, E. H., Robertson, S. J., Chow, C. W., and Bekhor, P. S. (2017), Infantile Hemangioma with Minimal or Arrested Growth: Further Observations on Clinical and Histopathologic Findings of this Unique but Underrecognized Entity. Pediatr Dermatol, 34: 64–71. doi:10.1111/pde.13022. Used with permission.
